plug_desp.message: Use ActiveX controls in your Chrome

copyright.message: This extension is made by eagleonhill.

issue_page.message: If you find any problems, report it here!!

option_help.message: Please enable the following rules or add custom ones as you need. You can also enable them later by clicking the icon at the right of the address bar if the page contains ActiveX controls.

upgrade_show.message:
Thanks for using ActiveX for Chrome.
 We have upgraded our setting system. Please check if our conversion is correct and remove all the related user-scripts(if any)

tracking.message: Allow sending statistics data to us for better development

status_ok.message: The controls on this page are working.

status_urldetect.message: ActiveX controls can be used on this site.

status_disabled.message: Some ActiveX controls are detected, but not actived.

status_error.message: Some ActiveX controls might not be working correctly.

issue_desp.message: We've already found some problems which may cause the controls not working correctly. Fix soon.

issue_submitting_desp.message: Please continue operating normally on this page. Report guide will pop after the current page is closed

issue_submit_desp.message: I'll copy the logs above in the issue report

log_tracking.message: Open log after closing this page to submitt issues

donate_label.message:
ActiveX for Chrome is abosolutely free to use. However, it did take us a lot of time and energy. We would apprieciete it if you could offer us some financial fund.
 Now we support PayPal and Taobao.

donate_record.message: We will keep records of your donations here.

donate_gotooptions.message: No matter whether you decide to donate or not, you have to configure this extension in order to use. Click here to set up now! You can return to this page from the foot of the options page once you feel good about this extension.

donate_share.message: There's more you can do besides donation. Just click a button below to share this to your friends!
